## LightModel.getTextureUniformName() method

Gets the name of a texture uniform by given key

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTextureUniformName(key: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | key of the texture |

**Returns:**

string

Name of the texture uniform
